name: Jewels Link Puzzle
description:
Come and enjoy this classic and amazing match 3 puzzle connect game!

This is one of the most addictive match-3-puzzle game with all the colourful and amazing jewels.

The game rules are very simple .You need to connect jewel by connecting most of the same jewels to complete challenging levels in this puzzle adventure. The longer your line will be the better you score.

Features:

- 160 interesting levels of match 3 game
- There are 8 different kinds of jewels with eye-catching interface and effects.
- There are special items: iced jewel, explosive jewel, horizon and vertical jewel, and other interesting items.
- There are two game modes: Puzzle mode & Arcade mode
- It's easy to learn but tough to master.
- Good graphical work.

Come and enjoy this amazing match 3 puzzle adventure journey.
